name: Kingdom of pencil
declaringWar: Let me draw our border a little bit bigger...
attacked: We may look easy to break, but we will always get sharp again!
defeated: We have become dull from our ambition. Congrats on your victory
introduction: Hello, what you're seeing is just the sketch of what our empire will be
hateNo: We are not agreeing to that!
afterPeace: My troops need to shrapen themselves now.
tradeRequest: We bestow you the honor of this trade offer.
uniques: [-25]% Culture cost of natural border growth [in all cities]

name: Eraser empire
declaringWar: You shall be wiped off the map
attacked: You cannot erase us, for we are the erasers
defeated: *Sir Deletor is not present. He has already been used up*
introduction: Hello, we are looking for areas to erase
hateNo: We are not agreeing to that!
afterPeace: Your empire deserved to not be erased. For now..
tradeRequest: We bestow you the honor of this trade offer.
uniques: All newly-trained [Melee] units [in capital] receive the [Besiege] promotion <during a Golden Age>

name: Ruler Empire
declaringWar: *Ruler smacking noises from afar. It keeps approaching.*
attacked: How dare you attack me! Prepare for some ruler smacking on your-
defeated: The ruler has become the subject now.
introduction: We are strict people who follow strict rules. Are youu ready to strictly become our ally?
hateNo: We are not agreeing to that!
afterPeace: This strict line shall be our border.
tradeRequest: We bestow you the honor of this trade offer.

name: Sharpener Republic
declaringWar: Your people does not deserve a dull headed leader like you
attacked: We are here sharpened and prepared for war
defeated: We have become dulled ourselves. We deserve this defeat
introduction: Welcome to our nation. Do you want to sharpen your mind?
hateNo: We are not agreeing to that!
afterPeace: Phew. That was kinda dull, wasn't it?
tradeRequest: We bestow you the honor of this trade offer.

name: Pen island
declaringWar: Your defeat has been written in the ancient texts!
attacked: You're asking for a pointless war
defeated: I should have expected it. My loss was written in the ancient texts, after all.
introduction: We are the islanders of the Pen. We will write down your arrival so that future generations may see the beginning of our history.
hateNo: We are not agreeing to that!
afterPeace: There. I signed it. Happy now?
tradeRequest: We bestow you the honor of this trade offer.
